title: Washizu - Tenka Sousei Touhairoku
description: The second installment of the Washizu series about Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's strongest rival. A few years after Enma no Touhai, Washizu has grown Kyousei into one of Japan's leading companies and declares at a party of political and business leaders that it is him who will control the country in the future. Naturally, those who don't take kindly to Washizu's attitude regard him as a political enemy, and begin their move to crush him behind the scenes...

matches.title: 3-gatsu no Lion Shouwa Ibun - Shakunetsu no Jidai
